text: Bossa Nova Baby is a rock n roll song written by Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller. on 22 January 1963 it was recorded by Elvis Presley. The album that included the song was Fun in Acapulco. The song reached #8 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart.'Memphis Clings to Rock and Roll', Billboard, Vol 75 No. 44 (Nov 16, 1963), p. 53 In 1963 it hit #20 on the Billboard R&B; Singles chart. == References == Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:1963 songs
title: Bossa Nova Baby
